name: Abyss of Failure
description:
Do you feel awake

Climb the abyss of your own anxiety to succeed, fighting for the highest score. 

You are nothing

Jump with Z, shoot with X, if you have a gun, I don't know.
To switch between full screen and windowed, press f4. 
To be a coward and leave, press ESC.

You will go down

Music by the awesome João Pedro Costa.

The game features online highscores from Gamejolt, go ahead and try to beat me.

You don't belong here

Placed #6 on #indiesvsgamers, but who cares.

#gjfest

You step in the elevator, you die
